message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it will be a great asset to you, and this is a very competitive price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm still not able to meet you at $16,000. I would like to stick to my original budget of $12,000 if possible. Would you be willing to negotiate further?
